To be totally at leisure for one day is to be immortal for one day.

Big people don't make people feel small.

Nothing is easier than fault finding.
Loss is nothing else but change and change is nature's delight.

It's always to soon to quit!
Go as far as you can see and you will see further.

See what you're doing wrong, laugh at it, change and do better.

Don't blame others. it won't make you a better person.
The sun is new each day.

We run to win, not just to be in the race.
